title: Galle Colonial Era Cottage
location: 10 Min Drive from Galle Fort, Galle
details: Cute 110 year old cottage with two bedrooms in need of renovation. The property is located in quiet residential area overlooking rice paddy fields and backs onto a verdant tea plantation. Located 20 mins drive from Galle Fort and only 10 mins drive to the Colombo-Galle Expressway, the beaches at Unawatuna are only 10 mins drive away. This is a unique and rare property due to its date of construction and beautiful original features.
